scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off ::- Copyright ©2014 Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. All rights reserved.
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
echo Configuration: %C% echo Platform: %P% echo PlatformToolset: %T% echo PRODUCTVERSION: %PRODUCTVERSION% echo MSBUILD: %MSBUILD% echo SEVENZ: %SEVENZ% echo C_SC_FULL: %C_SC_FULL% echo PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD: %PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD%
set LIBCURL_ARCHIVE= for /r %%i in (libcurl-*-%T%-%PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD%-%C_SC_FULL%-static.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION%) do ( set LIBCURL_ARCHIVE=%%~ni )
::- libcurl-7.39.0.26-v110-x86-release-static.7z echo LIBCURL_ARCHIVE: !LIBCURL_ARCHIVE! for /f "tokens=1,2,3 delims=." %%a in ('echo !LIBCURL_ARCHIVE!') do ( set LIBCURL_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%a set LIBCURL_MINOR_NUMBER=%%b set LIBCURL_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=%%c )
for /f "tokens=2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !LIBCURL_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set LIBCURL_MAJOR_NUMBER=%%a )
set LIBCURL_VERSION=%LIBCURL_MAJOR_NUMBER%.%LIBCURL_MINOR_NUMBER%.%LIBCURL_SUBMINOR_NUMBER%
echo [INFO][[%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% x -aoa !LIBCURL_ARCHIVE!.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\3rdParty\cURL\curl-!LIBCURL_VERSION! %SEVENZ% x -aoa !LIBCURL_ARCHIVE!.7z -o%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\3rdParty\cURL\curl-!LIBCURL_VERSION! if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR][%~n0%~x0]Failed to extract the file !LIBCURL_ARCHIVE! to the directory %WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\3rdParty\cURL\curl-!LIBCURL_VERSION! exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling: %MSBUILD% /m /t:build /p:Configuration=%C% /p:Platform=%P% /p:PlatformToolset=%T% InstallManagerExtn\InstallManagerExtn.sln %MSBUILD% /m /t:build /p:Configuration=%C% /p:Platform=%P% /p:PlatformToolset=%T% InstallManagerExtn\InstallManagerExtn.sln
if NOT ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Build completed successfully, rename the AMDComputeToolkitInstallManager.exe to AMD-ComputeToolKit-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.exe echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling ren "%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\%P%\%C%\AMDSDKInstallManager.exe" AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.exe ren "%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\%C%\%P%\AMDSDKInstallManager.exe" AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.exe
echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling ren "%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\%P%\%C%\AMDSDKInstallManager.pdb" AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.pdb ren "%WORKSPACE%\InstallManagerExtn\%C%\%P%\AMDSDKInstallManager.pdb" AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.pdb ) endlocal

@echo off ::- Copyright ©2014 Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. All rights reserved.
setlocal
pushd InstallManagerExtn\%C%\%P% echo [INFO]Calling %SEVENZ% a -t7z %WORKSPACE%\SDKInstallManager_%C%_%P%_%PRODUCTVERSION%_bin.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -i!*.exe -i!*.dll -i!*.lib -x!AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.exe %SEVENZ% a -t7z %WORKSPACE%\SDKInstallManager_%C%_%P%_%PRODUCTVERSION%_bin.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -i!*.exe -i!*.dll -i!*.lib -x!AMD-SDK-InstallManager-v%PRODUCTVERSION%.exe popd
endlocal
